text: Nde nan kɨvntogi, Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgir wari guiguigi gumgi vhɨrve, mbe tamtam kha nuianan rurga. Maaŋ muuŋgip, nden han zɨv khaŋ suanga gumgi, “Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar kha kamen na nɨɨŋgi.” Nde za mbe khothivɨ thari. Nde mbe mbui ŋaari gu mbe nzuai buni mbararari. Nde maaŋ muuŋv, nde kaŋgirga khe Fhe Bakɨme han kega zɨgi o, fhuvara.
